Disease.content:

Paragraph: Themography confirmed the existence of an excessive breast stimulation in 1 women who complained of moderate mastodynia and in 5 of the 7 women who complained of severe mastodynia .

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "excessive breast stimulation" and "mastodynia" as potential diseases. "Excessive breast stimulation" can be considered a symptom or cause of certain diseases, but in this context, it is mentioned as a diagnosis confirmed by themography. "Mastodynia" is a medical term for breast pain or tenderness, so it is clearly a disease. "Moderate mastodynia" and "severe mastodynia" are variations or degrees of mastodynia, so they are also considered diseases. Therefore, all four entities are valid diseases in this context.
